title: Kyrie and KD take down the Cavs in the play-in
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Brooklyn Nets play-in game win over the Cleveland Cavaliers. KD and Kyrie were near perfect, but will it be enough to beat the Celtics in the second round? Find out the X-Factor for that series. Timberwolves comeback vs the Clippers. Anthony Edwards and D’Angelo Russell had big games, but it was Pat Beverley that stole the show. Find out what that did for Minnesota’s confidence heading into their first round matchup vs the Grizzlies. LA Rams QB Matthew Stafford needed a compound so he bought two houses from Drake. Might one of our guys been to this location before? Listen to find out this and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
